title: MD
biography: Piyush Gupta is a Singaporean banker and the chief executive officer (CEO) of DBS Group between 2009 and 2025. He is vice-chairman of the Institute of International Finance since 2013, and a board member of Enterprise Singapore since 2024.
aiSummary: Piyush Gupta is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 100 at Pediatrics education (Member). Has been published in Science, Cell, Nature. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
